name: Melf's Acid Arrow
description: A shimmering green arrow streaks toward a target within range. Make a ranged spell attack. On a hit, the target takes 4d4 acid damage immediately and 2d4 acid damage at the end of its next turn. On a miss, the arrow splashes and the target takes half of the initial damage but no delayed damage.
higherLevels: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the initial and delayed damage each increase by 1d4 for each slot level above 2nd.

components.materialDescription: powdered rhubarb leaf and an adder's stomach

effects.description: Initial acid damage on a hit; on a miss, target takes half initial damage and no delayed damage.
Delayed acid damage at the end of the target's next turn (only on a hit).
